name: simple-vdom
description: A simple virtual DOM, not made for performance but for learning

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/jsx.d.ts dist/jsx.d.ts && terser -c -m toplevel,reserved=['vdom','render'] --mangle-props builtins -o dist/index.min.js --source-map filename=dist/input.js.map dist/index.js

author: Alan Lawrey
